data.title: Pinky and the Brain (Season 3, Episode 23)
data.meta_description: The Brain coaches a last-place baseball club, The New Hampshire Pineapples, to the pennant race. After Pinky unwittingly hits a button on The Brain's â¦
data.text: S3 E23: The Brain coaches a last-place baseball club, The New Hampshire Pineapples, to the pennant race. After Pinky unwittingly hits a button on The Brain's robot duplicate of Steven Spielberg (the show's Executive Producer), the robot acts out scenes from Spielberg's movies. The Brain decides he might be better served using a "Ted Turnerator."
